EDUCATION
INTERNSHIP
PROJECTSSOFTWARE SOFT SKILLS
FYP                                                  
Developed a highly accurate observer-based SoC estimator, achieving rapid convergence within 0.35 seconds
during MATLAB simulations.
Implemented real-time SOC monitoring with dual charging and discharging modes, displayed on an LCD screen for
effective energy management.
Demonstrated potential applications in electric vehicles and renewable energy storage systems through accurate
SOC estimation and system performance validation.State Machine Design For BMS
 IESCO (July 2023 - Sept 2023)
Completed a two-month internship at IESCO's 132KV grid station, gaining hands-on experience in high-voltage
distribution systems.
Enhanced understanding of grid operations and maintenance through practical training sessions.
Developed communication and management skills, gaining insights into corporate operations and organizational
dynamics.

input.additional_info: [Fictional Company] values candidates from top-tier universities such as [University A] and [University B]. We support diversity and inclusion in our hiring processes. Relocation assistance is provided on a case-by-case basis. We assess skills through a combination of technical interviews, case studies, and practical tests to ensure the candidate’s fitment with the organizational culture and job requirements.
minimum_requirements: Strong understanding of sales processes and negotiation skills
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
5+ years of business development experience in a leadership role
Proficiency in business analytics and digital strategy
